de.unihd.dbs.uima.annotator.heideltime.processors

Class HolidayProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unihd.dbs.uima.annotator.heideltime.processors.GenericProcessor
      • de.unihd.dbs.uima.annotator.heideltime.processors.HolidayProcessor

  • public class HolidayProcessor
extends GenericProcessor
    Addition to HeidelTime to recognize several (mostly, but not entirely christian) holidays.
    Author:
    Hans-Peter Pfeiffer

        public java.lang.String getEasterSunday(int year,

        Get the date of a day relative to Easter Sunday in a given year. Algorithm used is from the "Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt Braunschweig" PTB.
